t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Suika told me about some person to talk to...
If you're looking for that person, that would be me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You also appear to be unaffected! So, is there a way to break the spell?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Why not? I need to get rid of this absurd hairstyle.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: No, you should like your hairstyle now.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Well, you're an idiot then. I must know if there is a way to restore my hair to normal.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There is no way to turn off the spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Most of the humanoid and youkai-born girls in Gensokyo are having fun with their new hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I am proving that you may have idiots working for you. I hate this hairstyle.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I demand this be fixed before I'm forced to seal you inside a bottle!
